eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN IMMEDIATE EVACUATION FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Chelan, WA; AT 07:37 PM ON SEP 07, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 09:37 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
Chelan County Sheriff WILDFIRE WARNING, Level 3 Evacuation Order in Ardenvoir, WA. The affected area is All of Ardenvoir and the west side of the Entiat River between 8213 Entiat River Road and 10679 Entiat River Road to include Sunshine Lane and SInes Lane.. Leave now.  Roads and evacuation routes can get blocked. If you don't leave now, you may be trapped, injured, or killed. CHECK Local media or the Chelan County Emergency Management Website and Facebook. 
Repeat.
Chelan County Sheriff WILDFIRE WARNING, Level 3 Evacuation Order in Ardenvoir, WA. The affected area is All of Ardenvoir and the west side of the Entiat River between 8213 Entiat River Road and 10679 Entiat River Road to include Sunshine Lane and SInes Lane.. Leave now. Roads and  evacuation routes can get blocked. If you don't leave now, you may be trapped, injured, or killed. CHECK Local media or the Chelan County Emergency Management Website and Face book. You will be kept advised as conditions change.  Please monitor local radio stations and Chelan County Emergency Management Facebook for updates.
